definitions.body: root up, out : Pf. 3 ms. sf. consec. [[וְשֵׁרֶשְׁךָ]] Ps 52:7 he shall root thee up from ([[מִן]]) the land of the living; of fire (burn) roots, root : Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּשָׁרֵשׁ ְ]] Job 31:12 fore (fig.) roots at all my increase.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְשׁׂרָשׁוּ]] Job 31:8 be rooted up (of produce).

definitions.title: 2. Poe‘ēl
definitions.body: take root, establish oneself firmly: Pf.  3 ms. [[שׁׂרֵשׁ בָּאָרֶץ]] Is 40:24 (fig. of princes, etc.).

definitions.title: Po‘al
definitions.body: id.: Pf. 3 mpl. [[שׁׂרָׂשׁוּ]] Je 12:2 (fig. of wicked).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: id.: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַשְׁרֵשׁ]] Is 27:6 (fig. of Isr.); 3 fs. [[וַתַּשְׁרֵשׁ]] Ps 80:10 (id.; c. acc. cogn.); Pt.  [[מַשְׁרִי]] Job 5:3 (fig. of pers.).
